Acrylics

texttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttexttext

Acrylic Heavy Body Colors

Holbein’s new acrylic range is a high quality, heavy body artist acrylic, specifically designed to add more luster and brilliance to your paintings.

Acrylic Fluid Colors

Ready to use, smooth flowing, low viscosity acrylic color, made from the same lightfast pigments found in Holbein Heavy Bodt Acrylic.

Acrylic Fluid Colors

Holbein Acrylic Ink (HAI) with 49 colors, maintains the same color composition and high pigment strength as found in the Holbein Heavy Body Acrylic and Holbein Fluid Acrylic, but with a significantly lower viscosity.

Acrylic Iridescence Colors

Holbein Iridescence acrylic is an acrylic resin paint that gradually changes color when viewed from different angles.

Acrylic Gouache

Holbein Acrylic Gouache broadens the world of expression. It produces expressions in which opaque colors are vivid and clear.

Acrylic Gesso & Acrylic Prymer & Sealers

Heavily pigmented for exceptional covering power and high chroma, Holbein Acrylic Gesso is a mat finishing fluid acrylic ideal for painting, painting ground / foundation, murals, decorative and fine art.

Acrylic Mediums
